Text: Hi, I have downloaded the game, and it installs perfect, and then when it gets to 89% it stops!
If you are using Windows Vista or 7 then go into the CD, right click AOESETUP, click Properties, go to compatibility, and choose Windows XP i think it will work

Stops at 89% on full installation. :/ (going to try various compatibility options when I can be arsed)

Installs fine on standard.
